CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Reservoir Management relative to Borealis Water Cooperative?
SRP.A: Azure Reservoir Management is {below} Borealis Water Cooperative in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Water Board relative to Zenith Public Works?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Water Board is {below} Zenith Public Works in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Aqueduct System relative to Zenith Public Works?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Aqueduct System is {above} Zenith Public Works in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total water consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverhaven Water Board}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total water consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Borealis Water Cooperative}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Water Cooperative's maximum Water Consumption in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Water Cooperative's maximum Water Consumption is in {2005}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Aqueduct System's minimum Water Consumption in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Aqueduct System's minimum Water Consumption is in {2009}.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Consumption in 2013 higher or lower than in 2014?
NC.A: The total water consumption in 2013 was {lower} than in 2014.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Consumption in 2012 higher or lower than in 2013?
NC.A: The total water consumption in 2012 was {higher} than in 2013.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Consumption in 2008 higher or lower than in 2013?
NC.A: The total water consumption in 2008 was {lower} than in 2013.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2011, did the total Water Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2014?
NC.A: The change in total water consumption between 2006 and 2011 was {smaller} than between 2006 and 2014.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverhaven Water Board} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Silverhaven Water Board and Zenith Public Works first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Silverhaven Water Board and Zenith Public Works first exchanged leading positions in {2006}.
